activities.name: Dutch Design Week
activities.description: Experience the largest design event in Northern Europe, showcasing innovative designs, exhibitions, and events throughout Eindhoven.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held annually in October, this major design event transforms the city into a showcase of Dutch design talent.
activities.booking_tips: Many events are free, but popular exhibitions and workshops require advance booking. Check the official website for program details.

activities.name: Philips Museum Spring Exhibition
activities.description: Explore special spring exhibitions at the Philips Museum, focusing on innovation and technology.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings special exhibitions and interactive displays highlighting Philips' technological innovations.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance; guided tours available for groups.

activities.name: Strijp-S Spring Market
activities.description: Visit the creative district's spring market featuring local designers, artists, and food vendors.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in April/May, showcasing spring-themed designs and local products.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; arrive early for the best selection of unique items.

activities.name: King's Day (Koningsdag)
activities.description: Join the nationwide celebration with street parties, orange outfits, and free markets throughout Eindhoven.
activities.seasonal_notes: Celebrated on April 27th (or April 26th if the 27th falls on a Sunday), featuring city-wide festivities.
activities.booking_tips: No reservation needed; the main celebrations are centered around 18 Septemberplein.

activities.name: Spring Beer Festival
activities.description: Sample seasonal craft beers from Dutch breweries at this popular beer festival.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in April/May, featuring spring-themed beers and local specialties.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance; sessions often sell out quickly.

activities.name: Eindhoven Marathon
activities.description: Participate in or watch the annual marathon through Eindhoven's streets.
activities.price_range: Free to watch, Moderate to participate
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in October, offering perfect running conditions.
activities.booking_tips: Register months in advance if participating; great spectator spots along the route.

activities.name: Spring Art Walk
activities.description: Explore Eindhoven's art galleries and public installations during this seasonal event.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings special exhibitions and outdoor art installations throughout the city.
activities.booking_tips: Pick up a map from the tourist office; some galleries require advance booking.

activities.name: Food Truck Festival
activities.description: Sample diverse cuisines from food trucks gathered in Eindhoven's creative district.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in spring, featuring international street food and local specialties.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; arrive early for popular food trucks.

activities.name: GLOW Festival
activities.description: Experience Eindhoven's light art festival, transforming the city with spectacular light installations.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in November, creating a magical atmosphere with light art throughout the city.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; follow the marked route through the city center.

activities.name: Strijp-S Summer Festival
activities.description: Enjoy music, food, and cultural events in the creative district.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings outdoor events and performances to the industrial-chic setting.
activities.booking_tips: Check the festival website for specific event schedules and ticket requirements.

activities.name: Philips Stadium Tour
activities.description: Visit PSV Eindhoven's stadium and museum during the summer break.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers guided tours of the stadium and PSV Museum.
activities.booking_tips: Book tours in advance through the PSV website.

activities.name: Summer Terrace Dining
activities.description: Enjoy outdoor dining at restaurants throughout Eindhoven.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings extended terrace hours and pleasant outdoor dining.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve terrace tables in advance, especially for weekend evenings.

activities.name: Eindhoven Open Air Cinema
activities.description: Watch movies under the stars in various locations throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings bring outdoor film screenings to various venues.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance; bring warm clothing for evening screenings.

activities.name: Stratumseind Street Festival
activities.description: Experience the longest bar street in the Netherlands during its summer festival.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings extended outdoor seating and street entertainment.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; arrive early for the best spots.

activities.name: Van Abbemuseum Summer Exhibitions
activities.description: Explore contemporary art exhibitions at the Van Abbemuseum.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings special exhibitions and art installations.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online; guided tours available.

activities.name: Summer Music Festival
activities.description: Enjoy live music performances throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings various music festivals and outdoor concerts.
activities.booking_tips: Check local listings for specific events and ticket requirements.

activities.name: Dutch Design Week
activities.description: Experience the largest design event in Northern Europe.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held annually in October, showcasing Dutch design talent.
activities.booking_tips: Many events are free, but popular exhibitions require advance booking.

activities.name: Eindhoven Museum Autumn Festival
activities.description: Experience historical demonstrations and autumn activities at the open-air museum.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings special historical demonstrations and seasonal activities.
activities.booking_tips: Check the museum website for special autumn events.

activities.name: Autumn Food Festival
activities.description: Sample seasonal dishes and local specialties.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings harvest-themed food events and tastings.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance for food tastings and workshops.

activities.name: Philips Museum Innovation Week
activities.description: Explore special exhibitions focusing on technological innovation.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings special technology-focused exhibitions and demonstrations.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided tours in advance for groups.

activities.name: Autumn Art Walk
activities.description: Explore galleries and art installations throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings special art exhibitions and installations.
activities.booking_tips: Pick up a map from the tourist office for the art walk route.

activities.name: PSV Match Experience
activities.description: Watch a PSV Eindhoven football match at the Philips Stadium.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings regular football matches and special events.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets well in advance for popular matches.

activities.name: Autumn Beer Festival
activities.description: Sample seasonal beers from Dutch breweries.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings special beer tastings and brewery events.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance; sessions often sell out.

activities.name: Strijp-S Autumn Market
activities.description: Browse autumn-themed designs and products in the creative district.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings seasonal products and designs to the market.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; arrive early for the best selection.

activities.name: Winter Festival Eindhoven
activities.description: Experience winter magic with illuminations and festive activities.
activities.seasonal_notes: December brings festive lights and winter activities throughout the city.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required for general access; special events may require tickets.

activities.name: Ice Skating at 18 Septemberplein
activities.description: Skate on the seasonal ice rink in the city center.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings the popular ice rink to the main square.
activities.booking_tips: No reservations needed; skate rental available onsite.

activities.name: Sinterklaas Arrival
activities.description: Experience the Dutch tradition of Sinterklaas arriving in Eindhoven.
activities.seasonal_notes: Sinterklaas arrives in mid-November with celebrations until December 5th.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; arrive early for good viewing spots.

activities.name: Christmas Market
activities.description: Browse holiday gifts and enjoy festive atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: December brings festive markets and holiday shopping.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; visit in the evening for the festive atmosphere.

activities.name: Winter Beer Festival
activities.description: Sample seasonal winter beers and specialties.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings special beer tastings and warming drinks.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance; sessions often sell out.

activities.name: New Year's Eve Celebration
activities.description: Ring in the new year with fireworks and celebrations.
activities.seasonal_notes: December 31st brings city-wide celebrations and fireworks.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required for public celebrations; restaurants require advance reservations.

activities.name: Winter Art Exhibitions
activities.description: Explore special winter exhibitions at city museums.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings special art exhibitions and installations.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online; guided tours available.

activities.name: Oliebollen and Winter Treats
activities.description: Sample traditional Dutch winter treats throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: December brings traditional Dutch winter treats and snacks.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; popular stands are found throughout the city.
